headline: Assessing PACCAR (PCAR) Valuation After Its Strong Multi‑Year Share Price Performance
summary: PACCAR (PCAR) has been quietly rewarding patient investors, with the stock up roughly 15% over the past 3 months and nearly doubling over 3 years. This performance has prompted a closer look at what is driving that strength. See our latest analysis for PACCAR. Zooming out, PACCAR’s recent 30 day share price return around the mid single digits adds to a strong three year total shareholder return. This suggests momentum is still building as investors grow more comfortable with its earnings...
